DocAttribute.Name: YieldStress
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the yield stress (or characteristic 0.2 percent proof stress) of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: UltimateStress
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the ultimate stress of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: UltimateStrain
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the (engineering) strain at the state of ultimate stress of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: HardeningModule
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the hardening module of the material (slope of stress versus strain curve after yield range).

DocAttribute.Name: ProportionalStress
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the proportional stress of the material. It describes the stress before the first plastic deformation occurs and is commonly measured at a deformation of 0.01%.

DocAttribute.Name: PlasticStrain
DocAttribute.Documentation: A measure of the permanent displacement, as in slip or twinning, which remains after the stress has been removed. Currently applied to a strain of 0.2% proportional stress of the material.

DocAttribute.Name: Relaxations
DocAttribute.Documentation: Measures of decrease in stress over long time intervals resulting from plastic flow. Different relaxation values for different initial stress levels for a material may be given.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Yield stress, if given, shall be non-negative.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Ultimate stress, if given, shall be non-negative.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR33
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Hardening module, if given, shall be non-negative.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR34
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Proportional stress, if given, shall be non-negative.
